categories: Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Iaco Shild was a male Human from the planet of Dantooine who served in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War, as a droid technician. Shild was posted aboard the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Executor, and shortly after the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, he was part of a group of Executor crewmen who were tasked with investigating the murder of Lieutenant Tanith Sorn.
